meanings.sent1: The redrawers worked diligently to recreate the artwork.
meanings.sent2: The redrawers were skilled artists who specialized in recreating images.
meanings.sent3: The redrawers decided to redraw a famous painting with a funny twist.
meanings.sent4: The redrawers' hands moved like lightning as they recreated the masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The redrawers' attention to detail was unmatched, making their work stand out.

meanings.definition: Redrawers: The act of redrawing something.
meanings.sent1: The redrawers of the map made sure to include all the new roads.
meanings.sent2: Redrawers can help improve the clarity of a design by refining its lines.
meanings.sent3: The redrawers decided to redraw the blueprint using only crayons.
meanings.sent4: The redrawers of the plans gave the building a fresh new look.
meanings.sent5: The redrawers' precision in their work made the final product flawless.
